There are six teams in the league.Tuchman, Robert. (2009). The 100 Sporting Events You Must See Live, p. 325. ==History== In 1949, The league was founded as the Taiheiyo Baseball Union. There were seven teams. In 1980, the name was changed to Pacific League. After the 2004 season, the Orix BlueWave and the Osaka Kintetsu Buffaloes merged to form the Orix Buffaloes.Tamer, Greg. (2004). The Hardball Times Baseball Annual, p. 36.
